cards.name: Defend?
cards.description: Shield yourself from enemy attacks with your briefcase, completely preventing the next 5 physical damage taken this turn. The amount of damage prevented is increased by the user's Dexterity. This card moves to the discard pile when played.

relics.name: Potion of Courage
relics.description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

relics.name: Business Card Printer
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a thethorton:Business_Card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Look at that subtle off-white color. The tasteful thickness of it. Oh my God, it even has a watermark.

relics.name: Bank Deed
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 2% interest on held Gold.

relics.name: Helm of Sprinting
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random card with thethorton:Run into your hand. It costs 0 this combat.

relics.name: Bottled Funds
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card in your deck. At the start of each combat, play and Exhaust a copy of it.

relics.name: Lucky Clover
relics.description: 66% chance to gain [E] at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Monopoly
relics.description: Gain 50% more Gold from all sources.

relics.name: Necklace of Time
relics.description:
Replaces Potion of Courage.
Start each Elite combat with 3 Strength, 3 Dexterity and 3 Focus.

relics.name: Broken Calculator
relics.description: At the start of each combat, play a random Thorton card.
relics.flavorText: So what if the math's in my favor?

relics.name: Resume
relics.description: The amount of thethorton:Business_Cards required to obtain a Relic is reduced by 3.
relics.flavorText: Graduate of the University of Arizona.

keywords.name: Thethorton:Ingest
keywords.description: Ingesting Sync Boons activates one of your Destiny Reactors based on the number and type of Ingested Sync Boons.

keywords.name: Thethorton:boost points
keywords.description: Boost Points increment the Double Tricks of your Destiny Reactors whenever you Gather a Pyro Buddy.

keywords.name: Thethorton:business card
keywords.description: Whenever you play 10 Business Cards, obtain a Relic.

keywords.name: Thethorton:full flame
keywords.description: LOL they do something or whatever whooo cares

keywords.name: Thethorton:gathered
keywords.description: Gathering a Pyro Buddy places it into your centremost Storage Centre.

keywords.name: Thethorton:investment
keywords.description: Whenever you play 4 Investments, obtain a Relic.

keywords.name: Thethorton:locked
keywords.description: Cannot be played unless unlocked by The Key.

keywords.name: Thethorton:pyro buddies
keywords.description: Pyro Buddies can be Gathered into your Storage Centres whereupon they will Generate Sync Boons based on their Type.

keywords.name: Thethorton:run
keywords.description: After Running a certain amount of times, escape combat. If you're fighting a boss, deal damage based on the boss's Max HP to ALL enemies instead. Escaping gets harder every time you escape.

keywords.name: Thethorton:sync boons
keywords.description: Sync Boons activate your Destiny Reactors when Ingested and supply a passive effect to your Pyro Buddies.
